answers.author: Robert Vogel
answers.text:
Hi Emily - 
Washoe County, Nevada uses Peak Democracy's Open City Hall tool to collect online citizen input on many different topics.   Last May, they posted this budget question:
How can Washoe County absorb an additional $24 million impact to its 2011-12 budget if the Governor's proposed budget is passed by the Legislature?
123 people read that topic, and 16 people posted suggestions on how to deal with the $24 million impact.  
The suggestions were civil and insightful - you can read them here:
http://www.peakdemocracy.com/695
I hope this is helpful!
Robert Vogel
Peak Democracy

author: Emily Graf
text: Can anyone share with me what their community has done to engage citizens in the budget process?  We are particularly interested in what other Counties have done.
title: Citizen Engagement
